mapper.select: select RECEP_MAIL_NO , MAIL_NO , TAG_NO , SEND_MAIL_ADDRESS , MAIL_TITLE , MAIL_CONTENT , REC_CHECK , to_char(REC_DATE , 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MM') "REC_DATE" , IMPOR_MAIL , JUNK_MAIL , RESER_MAIL , REFERENCE , HIDDEN_REFERENCE from rec_mail where recep_mail_address = #{email} order by recep_mail_no desc
select TAG_NO , TAG_NAME , TAG_COLOR from mail_tag where emp_no = #{empNo} order by tag_no desc

select RECEP_MAIL_NO , MAIL_NO , TAG_NO , SEND_MAIL_ADDRESS , MAIL_TITLE , MAIL_CONTENT , REC_CHECK , to_char(REC_DATE , 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MM') "REC_DATE" , IMPOR_MAIL , JUNK_MAIL , RESER_MAIL , REFERENCE , HIDDEN_REFERENCE from rec_mail where MAIL_NO = #{ mailNo } and RECEP_MAIL_NO = #{ recMailNo }
